name: Time Override
description:
Time Override 

it's a game where you can control space-time and kill waves of enemies to reach the end of the level, the game is still in development so the early preview might have some bugs. the whole purpose behind me making the itch page is to get your opinions on the game.

and still, the melee attack contains only the animation. I hope I might be able to get it up and running in no time. 😅

You can join my discord server and my youtube channel to give your ideas on the game and where it has to be fixed. As usual, I will keep you posted through my discord, itch, and youtube 

Other than that enjoy and stay tuned for some banging news ahead.
